inclusion.criterion: diagnosed with SCD genotype HbSS, HbSβ0, HbSC, or HbSβ+
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: regularly followed by the UMMC Pediatric SCD clinic
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: patient in acute vaso-occlusive pain crisis
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: cognitive or developmental delays that preclude ability to complete study
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is a 34-year-old woman from Jordan with general and non-specific bones and joints pain. Her past medical history is unremarkable.
